summary: This bill, the "Widespread Information Management for the Welfare of Infrastructure and Government Act," aims to reauthorize and amend the Cybersecurity Act of 2015. It focuses on improving cybersecurity by clarifying definitions (including artificial intelligence and Sector Risk Management Agencies), enhancing information sharing between the government and non-federal entities, and updating policies and procedures for sharing cyber threat indicators and defensive measures. The bill also introduces outreach initiatives, addresses the use of artificial intelligence in cybersecurity, and extends the effective period of the Act.
